| History                 = Fisk Industries is legitimate business run by [[Wilson Fisk (Earth-616)|Wilson Fisk]]. It is the foundation of the Kingpin's criminal empire across New York.{{r|Daredevil Vol 1 181}}

[[Damage Control (Earth-616)|Damage Control]] was originally owned by [[Stark Industries (Earth-616)|Stark Industries]] and Fisk Industries, each owning half the stock of the company, though [[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Tony Stark]] felt uneasy cooperating with Fisk, a notorious criminal.{{Citation}}
